items.content_html: micropue UI is a dynamic web UI and utility library developed by MICROPUE. It uses javascript and css, and the package size is less than 150KB, which is very lightweight.The micropue UI provides a wealth of component and tool functions and classes. Please read the document.html document carefully before using it.
